item.title: 对冲基金蚕食中国金属市场主导地位
item.description:
由于需求下降，中等收入国家的中心地位日渐削弱，具有长远眼光的资产管理公司的影响力正在增强。【原文：

As the Middle Kingdom becomes less central because of declining demand, asset managers with a longer-term view are gaining influence.

】

item.title: Segantii 对冲基金因内幕交易指控而关闭
item.description: 西蒙-赛德勒（Simon Sadler）的对冲基金正在向投资者返还资金，这标志着该公司在香港监管机构指控其进行内幕交易后戛然而止。【原文：Simon Sadler’s hedge fund is returning capital to investors, marking an abrupt end for the firm after regulators in Hong Kong accused it of insider trading.】

item.title: 瑞士议会将于 12 月公布瑞士信贷报告
item.description: 瑞士议会负责审查瑞士信贷倒闭事件的委员会周四在一份声明中说，该委员会将于 12 月公布其报告。【原文：The Swiss parliament’s commission reviewing the collapse of Credit Suisse will publish its report in December, it said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行测试与 60 多亿美元贷款相关的 SRT 需求
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）正在就超过 60 亿美元贷款的潜在合成风险转移交易征求意见，这些贷款与墨西哥和巴西的汽车制造商和其他借款人有关。【原文：Banco Santander SA is sounding out interest for potential synthetic-risk-transfer transactions linked to more than $6 billion in loans, which are tied to carmakers and other borrowers in Mexico and Brazil.】

item.title: 英国临时大选让房地产市场沸腾起来
item.description: 本周在利兹举行的一次会议上，受高利率、持续通胀和规划瓶颈的影响，房地产投资者们又想到了一个紧迫的新话题：7 月份的大选。【原文：Bruised by high rates, sticky inflation and planning bottlenecks, real estate investors at a conference in Leeds this week had a pressing new topic on their minds: a snap election in July.】

item.title: 印度最大航空公司因运力增加而实现超预期利润
item.description: 由于印度最大的航空公司受益于运力的提升，IndiGo 第四季度利润超出预期。【原文：IndiGo’s fourth-quarter profit beat estimates as India’s largest carrier benefited from a boost to capacity.】

item.title: 商业地产债务支持的顶级债券亏损累累
item.description: 自金融危机以来，由商业房地产债务支持的最高评级债券的投资者首次蒙受损失。【原文：For the first time since the financial crisis, investors in top-rated bonds backed by commercial real estate debt are getting hit with losses.】

item.title: 高盛成为首家获得沙特总部许可的华尔街银行
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has become the first Wall Street bank to take a step toward complying with Saudi Arabia’s ultimatum for foreign firms to set up their Middle Eastern base there.】

item.title: 摩根大通为资产管理部门寻找私人信贷公司
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is on the hunt to buy a private credit firm to augment its $3.6 trillion asset management arm, as the biggest US bank makes more inroads into Wall Street’s buzziest sector.】

item.title: 前英国央行官员称英国大选扼杀六月降息机会
item.description: 英国央行前政策制定者迈克尔-桑德斯（Michael Saunders）表示，6月份降息的前景暂时已不复存在，但市场可能低估了今年晚些时候降息的可能性。【原文：Former Bank of England policy maker Michael Saunders said the prospects of an interest rate cut in June are dead for now but that markets are probably under-pricing the chances of a reductions later in the year.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。英伟达（Nvidia）的井喷式盈利提振了科技股，美联储官员倾向于提高利率以延长时间。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Nvidia’s blowout earnings pump up tech stocks and Fed officials favor higher for longer rates. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 在反洗钱改革背景下，道明银行交易额超预期
item.description: 多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）的资本市场部门表现强劲，超出了分析师的预期，该公司还表示，对其美国反洗钱计划的 "全面检修 "正在 "顺利进行"。【原文：Toronto-Dominion Bank beat analysts’ estimates on strong performance in its capital-markets division and the company said that a “comprehensive overhaul” of its US anti-money-laundering program is “well underway.”】

item.title: 耶伦希望货币干预既罕见又旗帜鲜明
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）重申，货币干预应该是一种很少使用的工具，官员们在诉诸货币干预时会给出合理的警告。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen reiterated that currency intervention should be a seldom-used tool that officials give fair warning about when they resort to it.】

item.title: 美联储的通胀辩论转向商品价格能下降多少
item.description: 随着美联储官员们在抗击通胀的最后一公里上步履维艰，一个关键问题正日益成为辩论的核心：商品价格会继续下跌吗？【原文：As Federal Reserve officials stare down the last mile in their campaign against inflation, one key question is becoming increasingly central to the debate: Will goods prices continue to fall?】

item.title: 中国计划为国家储备采购史上最大一批钴矿
item.description: 中国正准备在今年为其国家储备抢购创纪录数量的钴，而这种电池材料的价格正徘徊在 2019 年以来的最低水平附近。【原文：China is preparing to snap up a record volume of cobalt for its state reserves this year, with prices of the battery material languishing near their lowest levels since 2019.】

item.title: 法拉利首席执行官称中国电动汽车应成为欧洲的行动号角
item.description: 法拉利 NV 首席执行官 Benedetto Vigna 表示，中国电动汽车的出现应为欧洲吹响号角，让欧洲不再自满。【原文：The emergence of Chinese electric vehicles should sound a clarion call for Europe to be less complacent, Ferrari NV Chief Executive Officer Benedetto Vigna said.】

item.title: 汇丰银行因不公平对待欠债客户被罚数百万美元
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）被罚款 630 万英镑（800 万美元），原因是未能公平地照顾 150 多万遭遇财务困境的英国客户；这是该银行已支付的 1.85 亿英镑赔偿金之外的又一笔罚款。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc was fined £6.3 million ($8 million) for failing to fairly look after more than 1.5 million UK customers experiencing financial hardship — a penalty that adds to the £185 million that the bank has already paid out in compensation.】

item.title: 马来西亚 1MDB 起诉沙特石油公司高管，索赔 18.3 亿美元
item.description: 陷入困境的马来西亚国家基金 1MDB 已起诉 Petrosaudi International Ltd. 的高管 Patrick Mahony，就 2009 年与该石油勘探公司的合资企业索赔 18.3 亿美元。【原文：Troubled Malaysian state fund 1MDB has sued Petrosaudi International Ltd.’s executive Patrick Mahony for $1.83 billion over a 2009 joint venture with the oil exploration firm.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称津巴布韦改用黄金支持的 ZiG 是 "重要 "一步
item.description: 国际货币基金组织对津巴布韦采用新的黄金支持货币表示欢迎，认为这是积极的一步，这也是该组织自上月推出 ZiG 以来首次对 ZiG 发表实质性评论。【原文：The International Monetary Fund welcomed Zimbabwe’s introduction of a new gold-backed currency as a positive step, in its first substantive comment on the ZiG since it was introduced last month.】

item.title: 中国停止资助，巴基斯坦煤矿企业面临扩张问题
item.description: 据当地一家煤矿生产商的负责人称，中国和其他主要贷款人越来越不愿意投资巴基斯坦的煤矿扩建项目。【原文：Chinese and other major lenders are increasingly reluctant to invest in Pakistan’s expansion of coal mines, according to the head of a local producer.】

item.title: 中国股市再次落后于新兴市场国家，刺激经济反弹势头减弱
item.description: 中国股市下跌，与发展中国家股市相比，本周表现不佳，因为投资者押注这个价值 9.3 万亿美元的市场的反弹已经结束，需要更强有力的刺激措施来推动进一步上涨。【原文：Chinese stocks fell and were on course for a weekly underperformance relative to developing-nation peers as investors bet a rally in the $9.3 trillion market has run its course and stronger stimulus is needed to catalyze further gains.】

item.title: 肯尼亚在总统美国之行中获得价值 36 亿美元的高速公路协议
item.description: 肯尼亚国家公路局与 Everstrong Capital LLC 公司签署了一项价值 36 亿美元的协议，将修建一条连接肯尼亚两个最大城市的高速公路，这是威廉-鲁托总统访美期间预计宣布的几项投资交易之一。【原文：The Kenya National Highways Authority signed a $3.6 billion agreement with Everstrong Capital LLC to build an expressway linking the nation’s two largest cities, one of several investment deals expected to be announced during President William Ruto’s US visit.】

item.title: 俄罗斯影子舰队油轮在土耳其海峡发生发动机故障
item.description: 一艘运输俄罗斯原油的 "影子船队 "油轮在通过土耳其达达尼尔海峡时发生引擎故障，导致海上交通暂时受阻。【原文：A shadow fleet oil tanker transporting Russian crude had an engine failure as it was passing through Turkey’s Dardanelles shipping strait, forcing a temporary blockage to maritime traffic.】

item.title: 耶伦呼吁联合起来应对中国工业产能过剩问题
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，美国和欧洲必须针对中国工业产能过剩问题结成明确的统一战线，她还就中国宏观经济失衡对全球的影响发出了警告。【原文：Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said it’s critical for the US and Europe to present a clear and united front against Chinese industrial overcapacity, as she warned of the global impact of Beijing’s macroeconomic imbalances.】

item.title: 耶伦批评以色列扣留巴勒斯坦收入的举动
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）批评以色列说它将扣留代表巴勒斯坦权力机构征收的收入，并警告以色列不要切断巴勒斯坦贷款人与以色列代理银行的联系。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen criticized Israel for saying it will hold back revenues collected on behalf of the Palestinian Authority, and warned it against cutting Palestinian lenders off from their Israeli correspondent banks.】

item.title: 欧盟因蒙迪艾尔限制跨境销售罚款 3.375 亿欧元
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监督机构称，美国蒙代尔兹国际公司（Mondelez International Inc.【原文：Mondelez International Inc. was fined €337.5 million ($366 million) after European Union antitrust watchdogs said the US company illegally thwarted cut-price cross-border sales of its chocolate, cookies and coffee.】

item.title: 里拉是博雅策略师的最爱，回报率接近 10
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）的策略师认为，土耳其里拉是东欧、中东和非洲货币中的最佳选择。【原文：The Turkish lira is the best bet among currencies in eastern Europe, Middle East and African, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists, who see the potential for almost 10% returns with a carry trade strategy.】

item.title: 欧元区工资增长加快，向欧洲央行发出通胀警告
item.description: 衡量欧元区工资水平的一个关键指标未能在 2024 年初放缓；这对指望通过放缓来维持通胀回落的欧洲中央银行官员来说是一个警示信号。【原文：A key gauge of euro-area wages failed to slow at the start of 2024 — a warning sign to European Central Bank officials counting on a slowdown to maintain the retreat in inflation.】

item.title: 亿万富翁税分裂七国集团，耶伦反对勒梅尔的推动
item.description: 七国集团财政官员准备齐聚意大利斯特雷萨（Stresa）召开会议，但在如何向全球最富有的个人征税的问题上，各国意见不一。【原文：Group of Seven countries are at odds over how to tax the world’s richest individuals as finance officials prepare to gather for a meeting in Stresa, Italy.】

item.title: 纽约市游客带来创纪录的 49 亿美元税收收入
item.description: 由于美国游客的激增帮助抵消了国际和商务旅行的下降，纽约市由游客带来的税收已经超过了大流行前的水平。【原文：New York City’s tax revenue generated by tourists has surpassed pre-pandemic levels as a jump in US visitors helped offset a drop in international and business travel.】
